location: Tingzhou Road Section 3, near Gongguan MRT Station, Southeast Asia Garden Plaza
notes: Recently renovated within 3 years with mid-range finishes. 3BR/2BA layout on 2F with elevator access and ground-floor entry (no stair climbing needed). Good for families - concrete walls provide soundproofing, pet-friendly, cooking allowed. Near Gongguan MRT (100m) and NTU area with schools nearby. Has balcony (check railing safety for baby). Well-equipped with 4 AC units, appliances included.
